about_the_game:
An extinction-level event is looming over the prehistoric world dominated by reptiles. In an era governed by primal instincts and survival, diverse tribes emerge, setting the stage for an inevitable clash over resources.



Venture on a journey of evolution with a nimble young reptilian hunter carrying a Tesseract, capable of manipulating organic matter. Combine the primitive and the advanced as you duel enemies with a spear and traps, and take them down from afar with the magic-like technology of the Tesseract. Undertake a seemingly impossible task of preventing catastrophe that threatens all life, and attempt to discover its origin.




  • Fast-paced combination of ranged and melee combat
  • Explore a vast interconnected prehistoric world inhabited by reptiles in diverse stages of evolution.
  • Meet intriguing characters and experience their stories through quest-lines
  • Acquire materials through professions and engage in transmutation to create items, upgrades, and tools.
  • Explore different builds and play styles with a highly customizable load-out system
  • Undergo evolution by mastering an array of skills and abilities. Augment your agility through different movement techniques and bolster your strength by consuming samples of fallen beings.
  • Upon death, gain insight into the Spirit Realm—a plane positioned between life and death.
  • Delve into an intricately designed, hand-painted world characterized by vibrant aesthetics and a cryptic atmosphere.
  • Explore the history of reptiles, that dominate the planet, and unravel the enigmatic secrets that shaped their very existence.
  • Experience a rich orchestral soundtrack that echoes the cryptic and otherworldly nature of the primordial planet
